item.title: Spring MVC's checkboxes tag and support for enum
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: Using Spring MVC's checkboxes (or radiobuttons) tag to render form inputs for an enum property is easy and clean.

item.title: Spring JMS Remoting support for async calls and methods with void return types
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I've submitted a patch to the Spring Framework to give their JMS remoting feature support for async calls and methods with void return types.
